titles.title: Congratulating the Minnesota Lynx women's basketball team on winning the 2015 Women's National Basketball Association Championship.
Congratulating the Minnesota Lynx women's basketball team on winning the 2015 Women's National Basketball Association Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Recognizes: (1) the achievements of the players, coaches, fans, and staff whose dedication has helped the Minnesota Lynx win the 2015 Women's National Basketball Association Championship; and (2) the Twin Cities area and Minnesota for supporting women's professional basketball.
